Name: MARA Youth Technology Computer Club (MYTECC)

Details.ProgramName: - Involved in Multiple programs organised by MYTECC and College of Computing, Informatic and Mathematics as committee.
- Clearly communicated with bureau leader and high council ensuring all work exceed quality expectations.
- Produced Graphical Poster to be used on Instagram Story, Instagram Post and Facebook Post which resulted in increase user traffic.
- Produced marketing Mock-Up for products like metal nametag and jersey which increases consumer expectation for the product.

ExperienceSummary: Overall, The experience at MYTECC has developed my softskills exponentially. I have met and worked with various people and this has developed my abilities to work with a team and under a great stress environment. I am able to exceed all expectations when creating a graphical material for every individuals program, which has lead to increase in student exposure toward the program.

Name: Malaysia Agroentrepreneurial Club for University Student (MyAgrosis)

Details.ProgramName: MyAgrosis Neon Fun Run: Raya Edition
- Developed and brainstormed Idea for all programs resulting in more efficient workflow.
- Communicated well with Club and program High council ensuring all work are delivered on-time and error-free.
- Produced Instagram Poster for the official Instagram account @myagrosisuitmraub which lead to increased user traffic.

ExperienceSummary: The skills i got from leading 2 Graphic Designer Team in MyAgrosis Programs are truly valuable. Spearheading a team of up to 5 people has developed my leadership skill and greatly enhanced my communcation skill. This, undoubtedly resulted in a very successfull marketing campaign and we are able to exceed our expectation of 200 students for both programs.

Name: PhotoMedia Club (PMC)
ExperienceSummary: PMC has given me great exposure to the world of photography and videography. With various student with professional experience in the field, i am able to garnered significant tips and skill that i can utilize for my potential use in the world of Graphic Designing.

Name: JawatanKuasa PilihanRaya JawatanKuasa Perwakilan Pelajar (JPJPP) 23-24
Role: Infostructure and Infrastructure Bureau, Lead Multimedia Raub Campus
ExperienceSummary: Moving forward as a team is crucial for a smooth election. Soft Skills like communication, contributing idea, stress management, time management is crucial to maintain and improve efficiency. What I learn from being a CEC (Campus Election Committee) is that being punctual is an underrated soft-skills one should have, Especially in a time-sensitive environment. For example, I am responsible to create updates on an hourly basis for voters turnout for both Jengka and Raub Campus. This test my communication with protocol bureau and efficiency in producing quality posters.

Details.ProgramName: - Managed Social media page, particulary Instagram, Resulting in an average of 200 views per post.
- Communicated well with team Lead, ensuring all graphical poster are submitted within deadlines given.
- Developed a template to be used for instagram post and story, resulting in bureau members spending 50% less time creating posters.
